```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)


#test
table <- read_csv('table.csv') |> 
    mutate(Tag = Tag |>str_to_lower(),
           Subject = case_when(
               Tag|>str_detect('travel') ~ 'Travel',
               Tag|>str_detect('business') ~ 'Business',
               Tag|>str_detect('news|politics') ~ 'News & Politics',
               Tag|>str_detect('history') ~ 'History',
               Tag|>str_detect('culture') ~ 'Culture',
               Tag|>str_detect('entertainment') ~ 'Entertainment',
               TRUE ~ "Misc"),
  #         Subject = factor(Subject, c('History', 'News',
  #                                    'Culture', 'Misc'))
           ) |>
    select(-Timestamp, -Creator, -Type, -Img, -Tag) |> 
    arrange(Title) 
```

```{r}
#| results: asis


# Loop through table data
for (section in unique(table$Subject)) {
  content <- filter(table, Subject == section)|> 
    mutate(Title   = paste("[", Title, "](", URL, ")"),
           Example = paste("{{< video ",
                           Example,
                           " aspect-ratio='4x3' >}}"
                           )) |> 
    select(-Subject, -URL) 
  
  # Generate tabset and tabs
  cat('## ', section, '\n\n')
  cat(knitr::kable(content)  |> 
        kableExtra::kable_styling() |>  
        kableExtra::column_spec(1, width = "8em")|>  
        kableExtra::column_spec(3, width = "14em"))
  
}
```
